section-1-council_treasurer_key3: Monthly basis par budget create karna
section-1-council_treasurer_key4: Sabhi kharchon ko monitor karna aur ensure karna ki kharche budget ke andar hi ho
section-1-council_treasurer_key5: Ensure karna ki sabhi kharchon ke liye ek record maintain kiya jaye aur use Board of Governenrs ko report kiya jaaye
